sudo apt-get -y install ipython ipython-notebook
#sudo yum -y install ipython ipython-notebook
pip3 install jupyter
jupyter notebook
jupyter notebook --ip=abc.de.fg.ijk --port=1234 --allow-root
#Copy paste link generated by running the above command


%matplotlib inline
%autoindent

import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

#Enable zooming of plots in IPython Notebooks / Jupyter Notebooks
#pip3 install mpld3
import mpld3
mpld3.enable_notebook()


import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.style.use(['dark_background', 'ggplot'])
get_ipython().magic(u'matplotlib inline')
from IPython.display import clear_output
# Ignore warnings
import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')
